subject: 回复：订单 #SSN5540 的货物正在派送中
content:
{"description":"Hi,
I have not received my order yet for the haptics and the tracking number
looks fake.

Can you provide an update on my order?

","conversations":[{"id":158017059837,"bodyText":"Hi Zach J,  We apologize for the delayed response; we've just returned from vacation. Here is your shipping tracking link. This product has been out of stock for nearly two weeks due to overwhelming demand. We'll ship it out within the next couple of days and sincerely apologize for the delay.","isPrivate":false,"incoming":false,"userId":158001343601,"createdAt":"2026-01-14T03:55:52Z"},{"id":158017111855,"bodyText":"Thank you for the update
There is also a small 3 wire and connector coming off my brake pedal, I’m
not sure where it goes

On Tue, Jan 13, 2026 at 22:56 service@simsonn.com ","isPrivate":false,"incoming":true,"userId":158008829386,"createdAt":"2026-01-14T15:21:19Z"},{"id":158017156483,"bodyText":"Hi Zach J,  This wire is used to connect the base plate light strip module. If you haven't purchased the base plate, you can set it aside for now.","isPrivate":false,"incoming":false,"userId":158001343601,"createdAt":"2026-01-15T02:19:41Z"},{"id":158017370966,"bodyText":"Thank you,

Second issue. I have plugged in the 3 pedals into the pedal box and
connected the usb.

The brake pedal registers as expected but throttle and clutch don’t show
any input when calibrating. What can I do to troubleshot?

On Wed, Jan 14, 2026 at 21:19 service@simsonn.com ","isPrivate":false,"incoming":true,"userId":158008829386,"createdAt":"2026-01-19T00:37:00Z"},{"id":158017404855,"bodyText":"Hi Zach J,  Please click the Offset button first, then follow the steps in the pop-up window to zero the raw (white) pedal signal to 0%. After that, recalibrate the pedals: press each of the three pedals fully during the calibration process, then click Save. If the blue progress bar moves smoothly from 0% to 100% during the pedal test, the calibration is successful and you can proceed to bind the pedals in the game. ","isPrivate":false,"incoming":false,"userId":158000445778,"createdAt":"2026-01-19T10:51:20Z"},{"id":158017512347,"bodyText":"Thank you,

Just for feedback I found that the springs that go from the pedals to what
I assume are the load triggers were not connected (both sideways)
I was able to connect them back and get both pedals to register. For as
intense and sophisticated the pedals are (love them by the way) this is a
very simple breaking point.

Additionally are there any updates on the rumble box upgrades and when they
will be available?  SSN5540

Thanks,
Zach

On Mon, Jan 19, 2026 at 5:51 AM service@simsonn.com ","isPrivate":false,"incoming":true,"userId":158008829386,"createdAt":"2026-01-20T17:44:25Z"},{"id":158017548359,"bodyText":"Hi Zach J,     Could you please take a photo and point out the exact issue? We’d like to improve it based on your feedback and optimize future shipments. Also, the tracking updates for the rumble/vibration unit are as follows: ","isPrivate":false,"incoming":false,"userId":158000445778,"createdAt":"2026-01-21T06:30:33Z"},{"id":158017872894,"bodyText":"Hi,

Pictured (attached) is the spring on the throttle pedal. The clutch has the
same. From what I can tell this is what gives the feedback to the computer.
But also I bent this spring trying to get it back in without taking the
pedal. Still - works fine



On Wed, Jan 21, 2026 at 01:30 service@simsonn.com ","isPrivate":false,"incoming":true,"userId":158008829386,"createdAt":"2026-01-26T18:04:52Z"},{"id":158018255099,"bodyText":"Hi Zach J,  It won’t have much impact, as the spring is designed with sufficient compression travel and clearance. ","isPrivate":false,"incoming":false,"userId":158000445778,"createdAt":"2026-01-29T09:49:01Z"},{"id":158018266710,"bodyText":"Thanks,

Yes so far they work flawlessly - but that spring can potentially come
disconnected during shipping. Minimal problem, overall I am very happy with
the product.

On Thu, Jan 29, 2026 at 04:49 service@simsonn.com ","isPrivate":false,"incoming":true,"userId":158008829386,"createdAt":"2026-01-29T13:04:52Z"}]}
